4x1 with parallel items. Items orthogonal to the baseline-axis will use a synthesized baseline (border-box 'under' edge).
No item shares any row-like Baseline Context. All items share 'first-column' Baseline Context.
The 'justify-self' property (orthogonal to the shared context) aligns all items along the baseline-axis using the column-like baseline.
